title: Minecraft Alpha Release
trivia: Minecraft transitions from Infdev to Alpha, introducing biomes and survival multiplayer.

title: Minecraft Beta Launch
trivia: Beta release brings server-side inventory, achievements, and more stable updates.

title: Minecraft 1.0 Official Release
trivia: The End dimension debuts as Minecraft leaves beta during Minecon 2011.

title: Redstone Update
trivia: Minecraft 1.5 revolutionizes redstone with comparators, hoppers, and more automation tools.

title: Village & Pillage Update
trivia: Villagers gain new professions, raids arrive, and bamboo grows in the overworld.

title: Nether Update
trivia: The Nether gains biomes like the Crimson Forest and resources like ancient debris.

title: Caves & Cliffs Part I
trivia: Axolotls, glow squids, and copper breathe life into the overworld.

title: The Wild Update
trivia: Mangrove swamps, the Warden, and ancient cities change exploration forever.
